title: 4 aventures de Reinette et Mirabelle = 4 adventures of Reinette and Mirabelle
abstract: Contents: L'Heure bleue--Le Garcon de cafe--Le Mendiant, la Kleptomane et l'Arnaqueuse--La Vente du tableau.
description: A friendship between two teenage girls who share a flat: Reinette, a country girl who wants to become a painter and Mirabelle, a Parisian student. The four 'adventures', in the countryside and then in Paris, reveal the girls' differing reactions to nature, social injustice, money and the subject invariably at the centre of Rohmer's films, talk itself.  Credits: Producer, Margaret Menegoz ; director, writer, Eric Rohmer ; photography, Sophie Maintigneux ; editor, Maria-Luisa Garcia ; music, Ronan Girre, Jean-Louis Valero. Cast: Philippe Laudenbach, Marie Riviere, Fabrice Luchini, Joelle Miquel, Jessica Forde.
